Name: Elmer Yoel
description:
Elmer is 22 years old and lives with his spouse and young son in a family home with his mother in the La Chacarilla- Cayalti sector, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, in the coastal region of Peru.

Elmer is an agricultural day laborer in the La Chacarilla zone and annexes of the Cayalti and Za√±a district, with good working and personal references from his customers. He is requesting this loan to invest in planting rice on a rented plot of land. In this way, he will generate more income and improve his quality of life and that of his family.
